response.job_title: Software Engineer en PSL Corp - Now part of Perficient
response.summary:
Like challenges. 

Participated in multiple business fields such as petroleum, education, health, and banking systems ensuring quality and improvement of data process flow; consider functional and non-functional requirements for each task raised. Enjoy understanding business necessities and propose solutions that accomplish both company goals and final consumer expectations.

Learning every year and every day about software trends constantly looking for resources that improve my knowledge and the goals of all the people who work and live around me. 

Appasionate by understanding how a system works under the hood. Looking for frameworks, tools, and best practices that can be applied in work and personal life.
response.skills: JIRA, PostgreSQL, Git, Critical Thinking, Google Web Services, Collaboration, Project Management, Problem Solving, Spring Boot, Leadership, Angular, Oracle Database, Software Architecture, English, Communication, Teamwork, Business analysis, Creativity, Time management, Scrum

profile_positions.description:

company.name: Perficient Latin America
company.description:
Perficient is the leading global digital consultancy transforming how the world’s largest enterprises and biggest brands connect with customers and grow their businesses. 

Perficient teams in Latin America are comprised of experts proficient in the skills our clients need to achieve their technology vision and scale their software solutions.

At Perficient, we see our future as a community built around continuous learning and we seek to grow with professionals while promoting principles and values of an agile culture where teams are the owners of their performance. We are committed to our People Promise to challenge, champion, and celebrate our people to provide opportunities for all team members and build a great future together. #GrowWithUs
